summary: Add the missing continuedAsNewExecutionRunId field to the WorkflowInfo interface to support accessing the run ID when a workflow continues as new. The request also suggests adding parentId and parentRunId for child workflow support.
userImpact: Users cannot access the continued-as-new run ID or parent workflow information through the WorkflowInfo interface, limiting visibility into workflow relationships.
proposedFix: Add continuedAsNewExecutionRunId, parentId, and parentRunId fields to the WorkflowInfo interface
resolutionDetails: The issue was closed and referenced in documentation PR #696
keyQuote: add parentId and parentRunId as well which is useful for child workflows if its possible
